participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, loves nature and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: I like to wear zebra print to make myself feel younger. I love my work and just got promoted. I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides. I am a tour guide at the Grand Canyon. My dad works in the automotive industry.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, enjoys relaxing and spending time with family.
participant_2.background: I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors. My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer. I work in the pharmaceutical industry. I don't talk to my family anymore. I like a soft bed for my baby.

content.text: How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay, thanks for asking.  How about yourself?
I'm doing well!  I just got promoted at work, so I'm feeling pretty good about myself.
Congratulations!  That's awesome!  What do you do for work?
I'm a tour guide at the Grand Canyon.  I love my job because I get to meet people from all over the world and share my love of nature with them.
That sounds like an amazing job!  I've always wanted to go to the Grand Canyon.
You should definitely go!  It's one of the most beautiful places in the world.  What do you do for work?
I'm a farmer.  I work with my family on our sunflower farm.  It's a lot of hard work, but it's also very rewarding.
That sounds like a great job!  I love sunflowers.  They're so beautiful.
Thanks!  I'm glad you like them.  I'm really proud of my sunflowers.  They're a source of pride for me.
I can see why!  They're beautiful.
Thanks!  I'm glad you think so.
So, what's your favorite thing to do on the couch?
I love to watch Jimmy Fallon.  He's so funny!
Me too!  He's one of my favorite comedians.
I also like to watch basketball.  I'm a big fan of the Raptors.
The Raptors are a great team!  They're my favorite team in the Eastern Conference.
I agree!  They're so much fun to watch.
So, what do you like to do with your baby?
I like to read to her and play with her.  She loves to play with her toys.
That sounds like a lot of fun.  I'm sure she's a joy to be around.
She is!  She's the light of my life.
I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks.  I'm glad we had this chat.
Me too!  It was nice to meet you.
You too!
